TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NavigationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含支援巡覽的方法、屬性和事件。

span.span: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝下載的瀏覽器式巡覽內容中的內容的能力。 encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation. 內容可以是任何類型的.NET Framework 物件和 HTML 檔案。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 一般情況下，不過，頁面會偏好做為封裝內容以供瀏覽的方式使用 (請參閱)。In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see ). 內容可以瀏覽至提供的物件執行個體，並呼叫的多載接受物件的方法：Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the method that accepts an object: - - 或者，內容可以瀏覽至藉由傳遞至其中的相對或絕對 URI方法多載可接受的 URI:Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute URI to one of the method overloads that accepts a URI: - - - 當內容巡覽至的 URI，會傳回包含內容的物件。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. 瀏覽的存留期可以追蹤透過下列事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 。. 發生巡覽; 每次引發並不是所有的事件所引發的事件集的取決類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （已取消、 已停止或失敗）。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下圖說明這些事件的引發順序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期間或之後的瀏覽提供之內容所要巡覽，包括正在巡覽之內容的 URI 的相關資訊 ()，目前內容的 URI ()，和包含的物件若要巡覽的內容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 當內容巡覽巡覽記錄中記錄的導覽中的項目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 項目會加入向後巡覽記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫方法，或瀏覽至向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 項目就會加入向前巡覽記錄中，瀏覽至項目後巡覽記錄，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和報表是否有項目後和向前巡覽記錄，分別。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 此外，最新項目後會移除巡覽歷程記錄，請呼叫。Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 根據預設，不會儲存在巡覽記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，巡覽至使用巡覽記錄每次會建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被設計來巡覽大量內容時，避免過多的記憶體耗用量。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，WPF 提供數種技術，供您可以儲存一種狀態一段內容巡覽記錄中。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您也可以記住多組的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 已`sealed`類別，並因此無法具現化; 相反地，供導覽器用來瀏覽。 is a `sealed` class and therefore cannot be instantiated; instead, is used by navigators to enable navigation. 在 WPF 中，有兩個導覽器：和。In WPF, there are two navigators: and . 在視覺上，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]為導覽器中，以提供整合式的使用者體驗。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 實際，不過[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]實際使用作為 [導覽];屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]中執行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]會傳回參考，和所管理的瀏覽歷程記錄由管理的瀏覽歷程記錄與整合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]如下：Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - 當內容巡覽至藉由呼叫， ，並內在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]相關的瀏覽歷程記錄項目也會新增至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]瀏覽歷程記錄。When content is navigated to by calling , , and from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history. - 當中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]已選取[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]會導致巡覽回或轉送這些項目相關聯的內容。When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries. > [!NOTE] > A可以提供自己的巡覽歷程記錄，或使用它裝載的巡覽器巡覽歷程記錄。A can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it. 如果提供它自己的巡覽記錄，它可以顯示自己的巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]瀏覽的項目在巡覽記錄中; 這些項目不會新增至主應用程式巡覽器巡覽歷程記錄 (， ， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)])，因此，無法瀏覽至從導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]每個 (請參閱)。If provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (, , [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each (see ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷向後巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目。 to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history. 應該檢查這個屬性，然後再呼叫; 如果稱為和向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目就會擲回。This property should be inspected before calling ; if is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果多個導覽器共用的巡覽歷程記錄 (， )，最新的項目重新瀏覽歷程記錄可能尚未新增所之目前的巡覽器。that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (, ), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the for the current navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Content { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Content : obj with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定包含目前內容之物件的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.

value.span: 參考包含目前內容之物件的物件。

span.span: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下列其中一種設定內容：Content can be set in one of two ways: - 直接藉由將它設定為物件的參考。Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object. - 間接，藉由呼叫， ，或。Indirectly, by calling , , or . 設定瀏覽是非同步的因為起始新的瀏覽;不會傳回值，如果它在設定之後，立即檢查。Setting initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentSource As Uri
public: property Uri ^ CurrentSource { Uri ^ get(); };

value.span: A內容的最後巡覽，巡覽至所使用的 URI，否則如果。

span.span: A for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a URI; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性不會變更，直到瀏覽至不同的 URI 已順利完成。The value of the property is not changed until navigation to a different URI has completed successfully. 可以使用僅限片段的 URI 設定。 can be set with a fragment-only URI.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FragmentNavigation As FragmentNavigationEventHandler

summary.span: 在開始巡覽內容片段時發生，如果需要的片段位在目前的內容中，則會立即發生，如果需要的片段位在不同的內容中，則會在載入來源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 內容之後發生。

span.span: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，內容片段是內容也就是包含具名，即其設定的屬性，例如：By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named , which is a whose attribute is set, eg: ``` ... ``` 您瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]後置詞，以下列格式提供 URI 的片段：You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a URI with a suffix in the following format: \#*FragmentName*\#*FragmentName* 以下顯示 URI，參考至內容片段的範例：The following shows an example of a URI that refers to a content fragment: `http://www.microsoft.com/targetpage.xaml#FragmentName` [來源] 頁面載入之後 (後就會引發事件)，片段巡覽開始，嘗試找出[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]片段。After the source page loads (after event is raised), fragment navigation begins and the attempts to locate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment. 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]找到片段，則會指示內容的巡覽器 (， ) 來顯示，片段。If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment is found, instructs the content navigator (, ) to show the fragment. 如果您需要變更此行為，您可以處理提供您自己的片段巡覽行為。If you need to change this behavior, you can handle to provide your own fragment navigation behavior. 傳遞參數會公開針對此目的，是很有用的屬性包括： is passed a parameter which exposes properties that are useful for this purpose, including: - 擁有此瀏覽服務的巡覽器 (， )。The navigator that owns this navigation service (, ). - 片段名稱。The fragment name. 您可以處理覆寫預設 WPF 片段實作，使用您自己的自訂實作。You can handle to override the default WPF fragment implementation with your own custom implementation. 如果您這樣做，您需要設定至`true`; 否則處理行為的預設 WPF 片段會套用。If you do so, you need to set to `true`; otherwise, the default WPF fragment processing behavior is applied. 您應該避免直接初始化中的瀏覽事件處理常式。You should avoid directly initiating navigation from within a event handler. 由於現有的導覽，起始從新的巡覽，會引發事件處理常式會建立可能會導致巢狀瀏覽擲回。Since is raised during an existing navigation, initiating a new navigation from a event handler creates a nested navigation that can cause the to be thrown. 相反地，您可以間接初始化巡覽建立項目使用的非同步工作。Instead, you can indirectly initiate navigation by creating an asynchronous work item using the . > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 片段巡覽不支援鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面 (僅標記[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案與`Page`作為根項目) 在下列情況：Fragment navigation is not supported for loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] pages (markup-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files with `Page` as the root element) in the following cases: > > • 當瀏覽至在鬆散的片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面。• When navigating to a fragment in a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > • 當瀏覽鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面，即可在鬆散的另一個片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面。• When navigating from a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page to a fragment in another loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > 不過，鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面可以巡覽至其本身的片段。However, a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can navigate to its own fragments. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理提供自訂的片段巡覽行為。The following example shows how to handle to provide custom fragment navigation behavior. 在此情況下，範例會開啟錯誤[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]頁面上，如果在來源中的片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]找不到頁面。In this case, the example opens an error [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page if the fragment in the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page is not found. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 巡覽器已處理內容的瀏覽。A navigator has a that handles content navigation. WPF 有兩個導覽器：和。WPF has two navigators: and . 若要處理巡覽要求及管理瀏覽存留期，導覽器會使用 WPF 瀏覽服務，它會實作為類別。To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the WPF navigation service, which is implemented as the class. 裝載的巡覽器的內容可以取得之巡覽器的參考藉由呼叫方法。Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's by calling the method. 會傳回`null`當`dependencyObject`: returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - 是。Is a . - 是的：Is a that: 1. 是由另一個導覽工具裝載。Is hosted by another navigator. 2. 具有其屬性設定為。Has its property set to . - 不是巡覽器所裝載之內容的一部分。Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator. WPF 提供用於取得參考的兩個快速鍵:WPF offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the : - ，處理瀏覽至您可以從存取本身所取得的值及其屬性。The that processed the navigation to a can be accessed from the itself by getting the value of its property. - ，由來處理瀏覽可以存取所取得的值屬性。The that is used by a to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何可以藉由呼叫擷取瀏覽服務。The following example shows how a can retrieve a navigation service by calling . [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode2)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode2)]

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GoBack() cil managed

summary.span: 巡覽至向後巡覽記錄中的最新項目 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As LoadCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 當所巡覽的內容被載入、剖析以及開始呈現時，就會發生。

span.span: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您處理如果您要探索在載入完成後瀏覽要求的相關資訊。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion. 此資訊也可從傳遞給物件事件處理常式，並包含：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 內容和其 URI。The content and its URI. - [導覽器] (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他資料，如果藉由呼叫初始化巡覽或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 回應詳細資料 (使用物件)。Response details (using a object). 當 [來源] 頁面無法找到或載入，在此情況下，不會引發，就會引發。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)]

summary.span: 非同步巡覽至所指定的來源內容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to the specified source content.

Public Function Navigate (root As Object) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

returns.span: 如果未取消巡覽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將瀏覽至所指定`root`如果下列條件成立： will navigate to the specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - 事件未取消。The event is not cancelled. - Web 要求 (請參閱) 可以建立。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果`root`已`null`，現有的內容 () 會清除。If `root` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 下載 Web 內容，您可能會收到 Web 例外狀況 (例如，404： 找不到檔案)。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 您可以處理來自這類例外狀況。You can handle such exceptions from . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何瀏覽至物件，其中包含來源內容樹狀結構。The following example shows how to navigate to a object containing the source content tree. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 針對需要的內容，以 URI 來初始化的 物件。

span.span: A object initialized with the URI for the desired content.

summary.span: 非同步巡覽至 URI 所指定的內容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a URI.

returns.span: 如果未取消巡覽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`可以是 Web[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]或 有效的組件的 URI (請參閱[WPF 中的 Pack Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md))。The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack URI (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)). 將瀏覽至所指定的 URI`source`如果下列條件成立： will navigate to the URI specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - 事件未取消。The event is not cancelled. - Web 要求 (請參閱) 可以建立。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果`source`已`null`，現有的內容 () 會清除。If `source` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 下載 Web 內容，您可能會收到 Web 例外狀況 (例如，404： 找不到檔案)。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 您可以處理來自這類例外狀況。You can handle such exceptions from . 您可以使用瀏覽至內容片段。You can use to navigate to a content fragment. 如果目前的內容 URI 所識別的內容，它不會下載一次。If the content identified by the URI is the current content, it is not downloaded again. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何瀏覽至 URI。The following example shows how to navigate to a URI. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatecode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatecode)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Navigate (Uri source, object navigationState);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source, object navigationState) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri, navigationState As Object) As Boolean
public: bool Navigate(Uri ^ source, System::Object ^ navigationState);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 針對需要的內容，以 URI 來初始化的 物件。

span.span: A object initialized with the URI for the desired content.

param.name: navigationState
param.span: 物件，其中包含要在巡覽期間用於處理作業的資料。

span.span: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

summary.span: 非同步巡覽至位在 URI 的來源內容，並傳遞包含要在瀏覽期間用來處理之資料的物件。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a URI, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

returns.span: 如果未取消巡覽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 巡覽是非同步的因為它可能會在同一時間可進行的多個巡覽。Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time. 比方說，如果在單一頁面上，有兩個子框架，則可以瀏覽這兩個畫面格。For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating. 在此情況下，所引發的各種巡覽事件可能是引發的多次，一個用於每個所要巡覽至內容片段，而且不一定的順序巡覽要求。In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested. 因此，如果特定巡覽要求需要處理個別要求特定的資料，它就無法使用可瀏覽的所有要求的資料。Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests. 相反地，您可以使用`navigationState`巡覽處理，是一個瀏覽要求的特定傳遞資料。Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request. 下列的事件引數提供導覽狀態的存取：The following event arguments provide access to navigation state: - (傳遞至事件)。 (passed to the event). - (傳遞給， ，事件處理常式)。 (passed to the , , event handlers). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何瀏覽至 URI，並傳遞瀏覽狀態。The following example demonstrates navigating to a URI and passing navigation state. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowcode)]

span.span: Download content into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions, if .
The default is .

summary.span: 非同步巡覽至位在 URI 的來源內容、傳遞包含瀏覽狀態的物件以在瀏覽期間用於處理，以及對內容進行沙箱測試。

returns.span: 如果未取消巡覽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是只對獨立應用程式和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]內容。This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content. 這個方法會表現出相同的行為，並將它擴充藉由確保下載的內容放在部分信任安全性沙箱 (使用的預設網際網路區域權限集-請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md))。This method exhibits the same behavior as , and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigated As NavigatedEventHandler

summary.span: 當找到所要巡覽的內容，此內容也可以從 屬性取得 (雖然可能尚未完全載入) 時，就會發生。

span.span: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the property, although it may not have completed loading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您處理如果您必須下載開始時，找出巡覽要求的相關資訊。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences. 此資訊也可從傳遞給物件事件處理常式，並包含：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - [來源] 頁面中。The source page. 當引發時，至少部分的 [來源] 頁面[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]已剖析，並附加至目標內容的控制項樹狀結構。When is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control. - 要求的 URI。The requested URI. - [導覽器] (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他資料，如果藉由呼叫初始化巡覽或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 回應詳細資料 (使用物件)。Response details (using a object). 當 [來源] 頁面無法找到或載入，在此情況下，不會引發，就會引發。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigating As NavigatingCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 要求新的巡覽時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當要求新的巡覽，但來源之前要求內容，包括何時引發： is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when: - 呼叫 。 is called. - 或是稱為 (或從瀏覽選取某個項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)])。 or is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]). - 巡覽內容片段。A content fragment is navigated to. 您處理如果您要探索導覽開始前瀏覽要求的相關資訊。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts. 此資訊也可從傳遞給物件事件處理常式。This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler. A物件的導覽方式建立，而且可從參數，因為此時尚未已成為實際的要求，您可以重新設定物件，如有必要。A object for the navigation is created and available from the parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the object, if necessary. 您也會處理以取消瀏覽，如有需要，藉由設定設為 true。You also handle to cancel navigation, if required, by setting to true. 如果您取消瀏覽時，會不引發任何其他瀏覽事件。If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的應用程式裝載在瀏覽器中，您無法防止使用者離開您的應用程式，藉由取消事件。If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the event. 巡覽器所巡覽之內容的第一個片段之後 (， )，每個巡覽離開內容片段新增至巡覽記錄。After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (, ), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history. 如果您要儲存您瀏覽離開內容的狀態資訊時，您可以加入狀態的日誌項目，該內容設定與物件。If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting with a object. > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理來偵測是否已要求重新整理靜態內容，如果是，取消要求。The following example shows how to handle to detect whether a request to refresh static content has been made and, if so, to cancel the request. 。. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatingcode)]

summary.span: 在巡覽所要求的內容時，如果發生錯誤，就會發生。

span.span: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當可能或期間導覽中，會擲回就會引發事件。When either a or an is thrown during a navigation, the event is raised. 傳遞封裝例外狀況，並瀏覽造成例外狀況的詳細資料的相關資訊。 is passed a that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception. 當例外狀況的失敗之巡覽，結果，而且未進行處理時，列出的順序會引發下列事件：When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed: - 。. - 或 。 or . - 。. - 。. 如果巡覽器 (， ) 由一或多個導覽器`NavigationFailed`就不會引發任何。If a navigator (, ) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationProgress As NavigationProgressEventHandler

summary.span: 在下載期間定期發生以提供導覽進度資訊。

span.span: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞公開下列進度資訊： is passed a which exposes the following progress information: - 到目前為止下載的位元組數 ()。Number of bytes downloaded so far (). - 若要下載的總位元組數目 ()。Number of total bytes to download (). 會針對每一個 1024 位元組的內容下載之後，以及引發一次的剩餘的位元組數目是否曾經低於 1024 個位元組。 is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes. 基於這個理由，處理提供實用的方式，來追蹤和顯示目前的下載進度。For this reason, handling provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download. 不會引發在某些情況下，例如當相同的內容瀏覽至時，或當內容片段巡覽上目前已載入的內容 (也就是值屬性)。 won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the property). 瀏覽至已編譯的 XAML 資源，最終時可能不會引發事件。When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final event may not be raised. 這表示，在結束時的下載，最後一個報告，報告值可能不等於值。This means that at the end of the download, the last reported value may not equal the value. 處理瀏覽已完成時接獲通知的事件。Handle the event to be notified when the navigation has finished. > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationStopped As NavigationStoppedEventHandler

summary.span: 當呼叫 方法，或是當目前的巡覽正在進行，但又要求新的巡覽時，就會發生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您處理如果您需要下載已停止時，探索巡覽要求的相關資訊。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped. 此資訊也可從傳遞給物件事件處理常式，並包含：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 要求的 URI。The requested URI. - [導覽器] (， )。The navigator (, ). - 其他資料，如果藉由呼叫初始化巡覽或。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . > [!NOTE] > 當引發，它也會引發上的事件物件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 重新載入目前的內容。

span.span: Reloads the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的內容 (值所指定屬性) 瀏覽至 同樣地，不會再次下載內容。If the current content (specified by the value of the property) is navigated to again, does not download the content again. 若要強制若要重新瀏覽至內容，呼叫。To force to re-navigate to the content, call . 請注意，如果同樣地，巡覽至目前的內容是否藉由呼叫或，新的項目不會加入至巡覽記錄。Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling or , a new entry is not added to navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry RemoveBackEntry() cil managed

summary.span: 將最新的日誌項目從向後記錄中移除。

span.span: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.

returns.span: 向後巡覽記錄中的最新 (若有的話)。

span.span: The most recent in back navigation history, if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個或多個導覽器 (， ) 共用相同的巡覽記錄，可以使用一個瀏覽器擷取發生在另一個導覽器中瀏覽之向後巡覽記錄項目。If two or more navigators (, ) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Source : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前內容的 URI，或目前正在巡覽之新內容的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.

value.span: A ，其中包含目前的內容或目前正在巡覽之內容的 URI。

span.span: A that contains the URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將這個屬性設定為不同的 URI，與目前正在顯示，[導覽器] (， ) 巡覽至指定的 URI。If you set this property to a different URI than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (, ) navigates to the specified URI. 設定為載入從 URI 巡覽，除非則會取消巡覽的內容。 is set to the content that is loaded from the URI that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled. 可以使用僅限片段的 URI，設定，而且可以設定為`null`。 can be set with a fragment-only URI, and can be set to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopLoading() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 停止為目前的巡覽要求進一步下載內容。

span.span: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫只要傳回，並停止正在進行子框架中的導覽。 can be called as soon as returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames. ()(). 呼叫方法會引發事件。Calling the method raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 必須初始化巡覽的相同執行緒上呼叫。 must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何停止載入。The following example demonstrates how to stop loading. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowstoploadingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowstoploadingcode)]
